1.Flutter kicks:
i)Lie down on your back with your legs together and hands underneath your buttocks.
ii)Lift your right leg off the ground slightly past the hip height.
iii)At the same time lift the left leg so it hovers a few inches off the floor.
iv)Your back should be on the ground.
v)Hold this position for 5 seconds, then switch the position of the legs, making a flutter kick motion.
vi)To make this exercise more challenging, lift your head and neck off the floor.

2.Kettlebell Swing:
i)Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a kettlebell from the handle with both hands.
ii)Bend your knees slightly, push your hips back, and swing the weight between your legs.
iii)Stand up, contract your glutes and swing the kettlebell up to about chest height.
iv)At the top of the momentum, lock your elbows, keep core tight, and quads and glutes contracted.
v)Return to the squat position and repeat.

3.Leg raise:
i)Lie down on your back with your legs straight and together.
ii)Place your hands by your side and keep your legs straight and lift them to the ceiling until your butt comes off the floor.
iii)Slowly lower your legs back to the ground.
iv)Wait for 2-3 seconds then again take your legs up.
